sentence.Network_en: I think the idea of secularism is a very sound one.

sentence.Network_en: Unless are devoted to God, secularism shall not leave us.
sentence.Network_cn: 除非我们奉献于神, 否则凡俗之心便不会离开我们.

sentence.Network_en: They are no longer a huge threat to secularism.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们已不再是民主的巨大威胁.

entry.def: Secularism is a system of social organization and education where religion is not allowed to play a part in civil affairs.

means.word_mean: 1. a doctrine that rejects religion and religious considerations
